textBox.richText: There are only 6 more days left to go for the Game ON 2.0 exhibition!  I’ll be doing a blog post summarizing all the greatest parts of the past 6 months next week, so stay tuned for that! In the meantime, one of the coolest parts of Game ON 2.0 that I’ve contributed are the 2 large information displays (shown above) as well as the touchscreen information panel behind them.  I’d love to preserve the information that I’ve put into these.....so these next few blog posts are dedicated to showcasing this information for people after the exhibition ends, or if they are unable to make it to Game ON 2.0 this week.  Below are the Questions and Answers for the Game ON 2.0 Trivia (currently shown on the right large information display).  Now that you have all the answers, you can look like a game guru if you bring some friends to the Ontario Science Centre before Sept 2nd and visit the triOS exhibit next to the Game ON 2.0 entrance!
